stcsanalysis 0.1.11

Read STCS datastcs

read.Rd

Read files define in "VariableMetaData.csv"

Usage

stcs_read(
  dir,
  delim = ",",
  lazy = FALSE,
  progress = FALSE,
  na = "",
  locale = readr::locale(tz = "Europe/Zurich"),
  ...
)

stcs_read1(
  dir,
  filename,
  col_types = NULL,
  delim = ",",
  lazy = FALSE,
  progress = FALSE,
  na = "",
  locale = readr::locale(tz = "Europe/Zurich"),
  ...
)

Arguments

dir

chr. The directory with ".csv" files.

delim

chr. Default is ",". Passed to read_delim.

lazy

lgl. Default is FALSE. Passed to read_delim.

progress

lgl. Default is FALSE. Passed to read_delim.

na

chr. Default is "". Passed to read_delim.

locale

from lubridate::locale().

...

other arguments passed to read_delim.

filename

chr. The name of the STCS dataset.

col_types

Variables type. Passed to read_delim. See cols.

Value

a list of STCS tables.

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
stcs <- stcs_read("path/to/stcs/dataset/")
} # }
